Notes.
a Klim is the magnitude at which the cumulative distribution function of the observed K magnitudes reaches 95% of the total sample size.
b Positional error taken as error on the mean from the three subset images in each epoch and includes stars with K < 15.
c Data originally reported in (1) Ghez et al. (1998), (2) Ghez et al. (2000), (3) Ghez et al. (2005b), (4) Lu et al. (2005), and (5) Rafelski et al. (2007).
